title: Tria Ellinka: A Trio of Greek Goddess Tragedies
description: Echo, violated by Zeus and banished by a jealous Hera, rediscovers love, only to have it cruelly snatched away.Scylla, whose great mistake was falling for the lover of her rival, Circe, faces an eternity trapped in the body of a monster.Psyche, raised up on a pedestal as the embodiment of Aphrodite is married off to a monster whose face she shall never see.Three Goddesses emerge from the sands of time to set the record straight.Featuring the stories: Echoes, Scylla, and Heart and Soul.
author: Kate Seger
